I'm 45yo and i believe i'm starting to enter the peri-menopause phase in my life. Although I have not experienced any major or life-distracting symptoms of perimenopause like the night sweats and hot flashes, I do want to give a little natural-boost to my female hormone. I would like to start with the herbal option. This combination is perfect since it has many estrogen-boosting components (Black Cohosh & Dong Quai). Since I have yet experience any major perimenopausal symptoms, I decided to start with 2 pils before bed.  I will definitely continue purchasing this and may be increasing my dosage depending on the severity of the symptoms. I recommend all women above the age of 40 to try this hormone blend formula. You don't have to be post-menopausal to start boosting your hormones. Our estrogen level is declining quite rapidly in the 40s. Do not wait until night sweats and hot flashes come robbing away your sanity. Our bodies can always welcome a little support in the early 40s age.

review_title: Natural Supplements Take Time to Work
review_text: For those of you who expect immediate gratification: you cannot expect results within only one month of use, especially using a natural remedy. This female hormone blend, taken with additional Raspberry Leaf and Vitex (aka Chaste Berry) herbal supplements significantly helped to improve my severe menstrual symptoms over the course of 6 months. I take two of these, twice a day with the other supplements only the week before and during my period, and they have really helped to regulate and balance my hormones which previously caused severe cramping, nausea, etc. I am very glad I found this product and very glad that I stuck with it, and continue to use it today.

Have written a product review on large bottle (180 VegCaps) with title "Life Saver", so I don't write it again here.  It is really a life saver that I think I can't do without in my peri-menopause stage with irregular and heavey menses and severe menstrual cramp.

I am going into peri-menopause where I had irregular and heavy menses, spotting, severe menstrul cramp (every alternative day despite of other normal days) and prolonged period which lasted at least 2 weeks in the past 3 months.  And my last period didn't even seem to stop after 3 weeks of time.   My diastolic blood pressure dropped as low as 50mm Hg and my heartbeat raced to above 80-90 per minute that my heart palpitation got worsen.  I started to get more light-headed during the day and was hard to get up in the morning as usual due to dizziness.  When I took Solaray's Female Hormone 2 caps / 3 times a day, with  red raspberry leaf and hawthorn for the first 2 days, my period came to halt and I started to feel better.  After another 2 days, I was almost back to normal.  Even though I haven't finished a bottle, I feel this supplement excellent to balanace female hormone and safe me from getting worse with the awful symptons of peri-menopause.

I've been taking these to help me with my mood swings during that time of the month, and in general. It really helps, and I (as well as my husband) can tell the difference in how I act/react with and without them. Been taking there for half a year now, and plan continue.

I do not take this every day of the month; I use this one week before and the week during my period (14 days),and I'm only taking one pill, not two.  So far, I can definitely notice that my breast tenderness and cramps are less intense.  However, I've also noticed that on the days following my period, my breasts feel denser -- not in any way painful, just fuller than before.  My skin has cleared up a lot as well; usually I'm plagued by cystic acne just before my period, but my skin remained clear for the most part since I've started taking this supplement in August.  I'm also taking other multivitamins (21st Century, Mega Multi, For Women, Multivitamin & Multimineral) on a daily basis, one of which has a very low dosage of Dong Quai and Red Raspberry, so I'm sure that these combinations are helping keep my PMS at bay after less than one complete month of usage.  5 stars from me; I'm very pleased with the results thus far.

review_text: This dietary supplement includes fenugreek. A very useful plant. Medicinal properties of fenugreek are mainly related to the presence of steroidal saponins, polyflavonoids and alkaloids, which have anti-inflammatory, antioxidant and hypoglycemic effects. In traditional medicine, fenugreek is used in the form of decoctions and teas, as well as seeds ground into flour and mixed with honey for the treatment of various diseases. The plant is traditionally used as a tonic for women after childbirth, to increase lactation, and relieve menstrual pain. It is able to relieve pain and inflammation of the joints, eliminate the symptoms of gout, helps with anemia and obesity. Taking fenugreek seeds has been shown to improve insulin sensitivity and lower blood cholesterol and triglycerides. In addition, it is known for its aphrodisiac properties and is often used to treat impotence and infertility in both men and women. In the countries of the Maghreb, fenugreek seed powder (externally) strengthens hair, treats dandruff, cracks in the skin, and crooked nails.

review_text: I have been taking phytoestrogens for many years. Took different, somewhere there was an effect, somewhere not. But the reaction of my body to this drug surprised me. Heart palpitations, under 80 with a normal heart rate of 60 beats per minute. Anxiety and anxiety. When taken at night - insomnia. Moreover, I did not immediately understand that this particular drug was the cause of such manifestations, since I take several diverse dietary supplements at the same time. She suffered for a month, until she discovered the cause by the method of exclusion. Perhaps there are tonic herbs in the composition - stimulants, and I don‚Äôt even drink tea and coffee, so I‚Äôm very sensitive to such things.
